system.descriptor: The ability to perform precise bodily actions, such as leaping across gaps, perform flips, and contort oneself. More DoS means a more stylish or efficient result.
system.uses:
Uses: Leaping across chasms, falling to the ground without harm, summersaults, flips, cartwheels, twisting ones body, slipping past foes, Keeping Balance, Moving over objects whilst keeping momentum.
Special Use: Contortionist: Full Action make +0 Test to free from bonds, can only attempt once per restraint. Can also use to escape Grapples.
Maneouvering: +0  Test as Half Action to perform function of the Disengage Action. Jumping: Can use Acrobatics instead of Agility/Strength for Jumping/Leaping. Test to reduce fall by 1m per DoS
